name: places/ChIJu4KPUZRYwokR7QKU72Sro7E
formattedAddress: 47 E 77th St #216, New York, NY 10075, USA
adrFormatAddress: 47 E 77th St #216, New York, NY 10075, USA

originalText.text: Absolutely horrible experience. I never leave negative reviews but felt this one was necessary. I booked my appointment a month out, confirming my insurance multiple times. I then received a call the day of my appointment at the exact time that my appointment was starting (I was 2 blocks away), stating that they did not accept my insurance and I couldn’t have my appointment that day. When I asked why I was just receiving the call at the time of my appointment, the receptionist said that she had been out of office and was just now checking. I explained that I took a day off of work for this appointment and she was rude and unapologetic. Extremely unprofessional and unorganized. I can’t see why anyone would trust them with their insurance or teeth.

originalText.text: This one star review is by no means a slight on some of the lovely people that practice in this location but to serve as a warning to the general public that the business practices of this small business are not consistent with current standards of medicine. I arrived for a scheduled dental procedure and, after receiving numbing medicine and irreversible tissue removal, was informed that the necessary equipment to finish the procedure was malfunctioning. With no recourse, the office had only one option (not the intended procedure) to return me to my previous disposition. This would have been generally acceptable, for a short term solution, had the office not taken so long to send me a bill that I had changed addresses and not returned for any more dental care (for obvious reasons). They repeatedly sent a bill to the wrong address with no other attempts to contact me (phone or email) before selling my outstanding debt to a collector which quickly demolished my credit score. I can only recommend that the professionals in this practice find a better way to do business and that any patients look elsewhere until then.

originalText.text: I have been seeing Dr. Papadakis for over 3 years and he is wonderful. He treats me with respect and really cares about my dental journey. He always takes times to explain any issues. His staff his lovely. Their professionalism in unmatched. I highly recommend anyone seeing Dr. Papadakis .

originalText.text: I love Sydney! He's so good at cleaning and gentle as well. So nice. Dr. P is amazing! Kind, realistic, and caring. I feel that my teeth are in excellent, knowledgable hands.

text.text: I love Sydney! He's so good at cleaning and gentle as well. So nice. Dr. P is amazing! Kind, realistic, and caring. I feel that my teeth are in excellent, knowledgable hands.

originalText.text:
I had an excellent experience with Dr. Papadakis and Dr. Medina with a dental implant. It all begins with the office ambiance and decoration that is beautiful. The staff is very polite and courteous.
Both doctors explained to me step by step the procedures I was going to have done. They were professional, knowledgeable and informative. I guess almost everyone is a little bit scared to go to the dentist. Being treated in such a gentle and caring way helps you trust the entire process.
I was involved in all the decision making as they showed me the x-rays, positioning of the implant, choosing of the color for the crown and so forth.
If you are looking for a high-tech and advanced dental office this is an excellent option for you. I’m completely satisfied with this dental office and I rate it 5 stars out of 5.
